accomodations.message: We have not reserved a block of rooms, so feel free to stay wherever you'd like! Whether you find a killer AirBnb in Le Plateau or a beautiful hotel in Vieux-Montréal, the venue is a short 5 minute walk from the McGill metro station on the green line. If you would rather stay close to the venue, some nearby hotel options can be found below.

rsvp.infants: While this is an 18+ event, we are able to accomodate nursing infants. Please let us know as soon as possible so that the proper arrangements can be made.
rsvp.rsvpMessageAttending: Thank you for submitting your response, we can't wait to see you!
rsvp.rsvpMessageNotAttending: We'll miss you at the wedding, but hope to see you soon! Thank you for submitting your response.
rsvp.rsvpMessageError: There was an error submitting your RSVP. Please try again.
